events.name: Ethereum Visits Singapore
events.description: Join us for this Two-day event to learn more about block chain 2.0 technology and how it applies to the real world. We will provide an introduction to block chain technology and it's use cases apart from bitcoin. The second day of the event will be a coding workshop for everyone of all skill levels to participate and see what kind of interesting programs they can come up with on the block chain. Gavin Wood (Co-Founder of Ethereum), George Hallam and Ken Kappler will be speaking, and we will have live video conferences with a few start ups on the block chain, ie www.provenance.org. DigixGlobal (www.dgx.io), the first smart asset company built on Ethereum's block chain, will be helping to host the event. Calvin Soh will also be guest speaking. He was a creative director for several mnc ad agencies and is currently a branding and marketing consultant for innovative technologies. Amazing dinner will be served so come with empty stomachs and open minds! Spaces are limited so please sign up for this free and informative event!
events.location: Singapore Management University, School of Economics, Level 2, Seminar Room 2.5, 90 Stamford Road, Singapore Management University, Singapore 178903

events.name: 1st Bluemix SG Meetup: Bluemix + IoT = Smart Data
events.description: Welcome to the 1st Bluemix SG Meetup. We will try to have a regular meetup on the last Thursday of every month. For this meetup, we have Stephan Wissel from IBM to talk about IoT on Bluemix. Find out how Bluemix can help you, a hardware and IoT maker, easily deliver huge amount of data from various sources to a single platform to easily make data smart, quickly transforming it through Node-RED and create something meaningful. We also have Nikolay Vlasov from IBM who will be demo-ing his Air Quality Sensor connected to Bluemix! Look forward to meeting everyone! Register here for your Bluemix account.

events.name: Virtual Reality/Augmented Reality meetup#4 (Virtual Reality Theraphy and more)
events.description: #03-04 #03-04 As always, this event is about getting to know the rapidly growing VR community in Singapore in a casual and friendly environment. Come join us to learn about and discuss the most exciting space in computing technology. ------------------ Speakers ------------------ We've invited Institute of Mental Health to present the VR system for the upcoming meetup. They have developed for the children with selective mutism. ------------------ Agenda ------------------ 1. Get to know everyone 2. Topics : VR Therapy for selective mutism children by Zi Jun and Clare Kwan Hui Min from Instituted of Mental health (IMH) 3D Scanner review by Sydney Wu, Founder of Wedding Penguin How to kickstart VR Website, Jia Hen 3. AR/VR project pitch. 4. Getting feedback! ------------------ Location #03-04, IDA Labs @ National Design Centre Walk all the way to the right when enter the auditorium. Ask the guard at the entrance for direction to #03-04 ------------------
events.location: #03-04, IDA labs @ National Design Centre,  #03-04, 111 Middle Road, 188969, Singapore
events.group_name: SGVRAR - SG Virtual Reality/Augmented Reality meetup
